member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.AccessTokenApi
member.summary: Represents a collection of functions to interact with the API endpoints.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.AccessTokenApi.Create(System.String,System.String,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.param: This is the oAuth token obtained from request token call.
This verifier is returned on the callback and used in the access token request.
member.remarks:
This service is used to get long access token / access token.
To get access token following fields will be require: Request Token (oauth_token) and Verifier (oauth_verifier) from the merchant callback. For Pairing during checkout, this service will need to be called twice.
To exchange for a Long Access Token which is used to retrieve precheckout data.
To exchange for an Access Token which is used to retrieve checkout data.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
Use the ErrorObject property in case of SdkErrorResponseException to extract the error information.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.
If oauthToken is null or empty.
If oauthVerifier is null or empty.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.AccessTokenApi.ApiClient
member.summary:
Gets the API client instance.
ApiClient is initialize with the and for API tracking and error handling respectively.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.RequestTokenApi
member.summary: Represents a collection of functions to interact with the API endpoints.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.RequestTokenApi.Create(System.String,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.param: Endpoint that will handle the transition from the wallet site to the merchant checkout page.
member.remarks:
This service is used to get request token (OAuthToken).
This must be executed when a consumer clicks Buy with MasterPass or Connect with MasterPass buttons on your site/application.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
Use the ErrorObject property in case of SdkErrorResponseException to extract the error information.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.
If oauthCallback is null or empty.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Api.RequestTokenApi.ApiClient
member.summary:
Gets the API client instance.
ApiClient is initialize with the and for API tracking and error handling respectively.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient
member.summary:
API client is mainly responsible for making the HTTP call to the API backend.
Authenticator, Configuration and RestClient properties initializes with instances of , and respectively.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class with defaults values Authenticator, Configuration and RestClient.
Also validates whether API environment configurations registered or not. Throws the exception if not registered.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Execute(Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ServiceRequest,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.summary:
Makes the synchronous HTTP request.
First it serializes the request body if any, executes the request.
Also it logs the response based on specified logging configuration and handles the error if any API service returns a response with HTTP status code other than 200.
When overridden in a derived class, executes the request.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Execute``1(Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ServiceRequest,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.summary:
Makes the synchronous HTTP request.
First it serializes the request body if any, executes the request, handles the response and de-serializes the response content into specified type.
Also it logs the response based on specified logging configuration and handles the error if any API service returns a response with HTTP status code other than 200.
When overridden in a derived class, executes the request, handles the response, convert the response content into specified type and returns it.
member.typeparam: The type in which response content is de-serialized.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.ExecuteAsync(Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ServiceRequest,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.summary:
Makes the asynchronous HTTP request.
First it serializes the request body if any, executes the request and handles the response.
Also it logs the response based on specified logging configuration and handles the error if any API service returns a response with HTTP status code other than 200.
When overridden in a derived class, executes the request.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.ExecuteAsync``1(Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ServiceRequest,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.ApiConfig)
member.summary:
Makes the asynchronous HTTP request.
First it serializes the request body if any, executes the request, handles the response and de-serializes the response content into specified type.
Also it logs the response based on specified logging configuration and handles the error if any API service returns a response with HTTP status code other than 200.
When overridden in a derived class, executes the request, handles the response, convert the response content into specified type and returns it.
member.typeparam: The type in which response content is de-serialized.
member.returns: An asynchronous task operation with the specified response type instance.

exception.para: If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code.
If request/response is unable to serialized/de-serialized.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Serialize(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Serializes a request body object into data formatted string.
If is assigned, It uses Serializer to serialize the request content; otherwise it use the serializer based on request content type.
When overridden in a derived class, serialize the request body based on Serializer property or use the serializer to serialize the request body based on request content type.

exception.para: If specified request body is unable to serialized.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Deserialize``1(RestSharp.IRestResponse)
member.summary:
De-serializes the response content into specified type instance.
If is assigned, It uses Serializer to deserialize the response content; otherwise it use the serializer based on response content type.
When overridden in a derived class, de-serialize the request body based on Serializer property or use the de-serializer to de-serialize the response content based on response content type.
member.typeparam: The type in which response content is de-serialized.

exception.para: If response content is unable to de-serialize with specified type.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.ParameterToString(System.Object)
member.summary: If parameter is DateTime, output in a formatted string (default ISO 8601), customizable with Configuration.DateTime. If parameter is a list, join the list with ",". Otherwise just return the string.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Serializer
P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.ApiTracker
member.summary:
Gets or sets the .
ApiTracker adds the API tacking and user-agent informations to each request.
If value is specified, its also assigned to Authenticator.ApiTracker property.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.RestClient
member.summary:
Gets or sets the .
Translate RestRequests into HTTP requests and process response.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Authenticator
member.summary:
Gets the MasterCard API authenticator.
Authenticator intercept the RestSharp.RestClient and RestSharp.RestRequest to add the authorization header, tracking headers and also logs the request.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.ErrorHandler
member.summary:
Gets or sets the error handler for response error handling.
Mostly API service classes initialize the ErrorHandler property with instance.
If API service returns a response which has other than 200 HTTP status code, ErrorHandler handles the response and throws the exception with proper error data.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.ApiClient.Configuration
member.summary:
Gets or sets the . Initializes with default values.
Request timeout, request default headers, date-time format can be modify by accessing Configuration property.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.MasterCardErrorHandler
member.summary: Handles the response errors. Throws the exception if response's HTTP status code is other than 200 (OK).

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.ISdkErrorHandler
member.summary: Handles the response errors.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.ISdkErrorHandler.Handle(RestSharp.IRestResponse)
member.summary: Handles the error response.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.MasterCardErrorHandler.Handle(RestSharp.IRestResponse)
member.summary:
Handles the error response. Throws the exception if response's HTTP status code is other than 200 (OK).
Use the ErrorObject property in case of SdkErrorResponseException to extract the error information.

exception.para: If response has HTTP status code other than 200.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.DefaultApiTracker
member.summary:
Implements the to get the API tracking and user-agent informations.
ApiClient uses the DefaultApiTracker in request and access token APIs for API tacking. Returns the API tracking and user-agent informations as below:
API-Call-Tracker: base_sdk_version=1.1.0,lang_name=C#,lang_version=4.0.30319.42000 User-Agent: MC Open API OAuth Framework v1.0-C#

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.IApiTracker
member.summary: Provides interface to get the API tracking and user agent information.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.IApiTracker.GetTrackingInfo
member.summary: Gets the tracking information.
member.returns: The string containing tracking keys and values.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.IApiTracker.GetUserAgentInfo
member.summary: Gets the user agent information.
member.returns: The string containing user agent value.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.DefaultApiTracker.GetTrackingInfo
member.summary:
Gets the API tracking information.
Also "pluginVersion" key presents in collection, its value is appended in tracking information.
member.returns: The string containing tracking keys and values.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.DefaultApiTracker.GetUserAgentInfo
member.summary: Gets the user-agent information.

uses default configuration settings while executing APIs.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.Configuration.Timeout
member.summary:
Gets or sets the HTTP request timeout (milliseconds).
Default to 100000 milliseconds.
uses timeout value to set into request timeout.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.Configuration.DefaultHeaders
member.summary:
Gets or sets the request default headers.
uses default headers to set into each request's headers.

member.name: P:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Client.Configuration.DateTimeFormat
member.summary:
Gets or sets the date time format used when serializing in the . By default, it's set to ISO 8601 - "o".
If any API parameter is of type , this parameter is converted into specified DateTimeFormat string.
No validation is done to ensure that the string you're providing is valid.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.MasterCardApiTracking
member.summary:
Provides a set of methods and properties that helps to trace the API call.
Adds API tracker and user agent informations to the specified request's headers.

member.summary: Adds API tracker and user agent informations to the specified request's headers.

exception.para: if specified IApiTracker is null.
if specified IApiTracker returns null or empty tracking/user-agent informations.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.MasterCardAuthenticator
member.summary:
Performs below set of operations in each request.
Adds the Authorization header to request.
Adds the API tracking and user-agent informations to request header.
Logs the request information if logging is enabled.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.MasterCardAuthenticator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary:

Adds the API tracking and user-agent informations to request header.
Logs the request information if logging is enabled.

member.summary:

ApiTracker adds the API tacking and user-agent informations to each request.

member.name: T:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Serializers.SdkSerializerFactory

Serializer factory, returns instance of serializer based on specified depend on request and response content type.
Also custom instance configured through SetSerializer with specified the content type.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Serializers.SdkSerializerFactory.GetSerializer(System.String)
member.summary:
Gets the serializer based on specified content type.
Method returns below possible implementation based on specified content type.
application/xml:
application/json:
application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
var serializer = SdkSerializerFactory.GetSerializer("application/xml");

exception.para: if contentType is null or Empty.

member.name: M:Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Serializers.SdkSerializerFactory.SetSerializer(System.String,Com.MasterCard.Sdk.Core.Interfaces.ISerializer)
member.summary:
Sets the instance with specified content type.
SdkSerializerFactory.SetSerializer("application/xml", new CustomXmlSerializer());
